channel.title: Tor.service error: 'systemctl daemon-reload' recommended
channel.description:
I just did a simply damn update via apt-get and now tor on my whonix workstation doesn't work no more. If I try to restart tor with sudo service tor restart I get this error:
Warning: Unit file of tor.service changed on disk, 'systemctl daemon-reload' recommended
How can I fix this?

item.title: Tor.service error: 'systemctl daemon-reload' recommended
item.dc:creator: LarryBird1
item.description:
Thanks man I’ll try that! Actually now it works again even without trying that command

Read full topic

item.title: Tor.service error: 'systemctl daemon-reload' recommended
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
That was recently changed The Tor Project. The command to restart Tor is now:

sudo service tor@default restart

And it has to be run on the gateway, not on the workstation.

Read full topic
